field.label: Hash algorithm
field.tooltip: This must be identical to the value in the Ingenico ePayments backend in section Technical information on tab Global security parameters.

field.label: SHA-IN Pass phrase
field.comment: Refer to Ingenico ePayment's backend in section Technical Information on tab Data and origin verification.

field.label: Mode
field.tooltip: Depending on the selection the extension will communicate with the Ingenico ePayments test or production service. Choose custom, if you have to use special urls for the gateway.
field.comment: Please note that, after changing this value, you might also need to update additional fields like API-User and password, PSPID or SHA-IN/OUT pass phrase.

Production url example: https://secure.ogone.com/ncol/prod/orderstandard_utf8.asp

field.tooltip: This setting will override the configuration in the Ingenico ePayments backend in section Technical information on tab Global transaction parameters.

field.tooltip: The email template to use. Choose 'Default Template from Locale' to use Ingenico ePayments extensions default template.

field.label: PayPerMail Email Template.
field.tooltip: The email template to use. Choose 'Default Template from Locale' to use Ingenico ePayments extensions default template.

field.label: Enable device fingerprinting
field.comment: When enabling this, you still need to request the explicit consent of the customer in the checkout to transmit this data.
field.tooltip: This functionality will transmit specific customer data as hash to Ingenico ePayments to identify the device from which the transaction was sent can be identified with the highest probability.

field.label: Timeout for transactions
field.comment: This value specifies the request timeout for that transaction. A value between 30 and 60 is possible.

field.label: Credit/Debit card Split
field.tooltip: If activated an extra parameter is transmitted to Ingenico ePayments for the Creditcard/Debitcard payment methods.
field.comment: See also Ingenico ePayments documentation.

field.label: Debug
field.tooltip: This will log requests and responses in /var/log/ops.log
field.comment: Make sure the global Magento logging is also enabled.

field.label: Enable redirect payment for all card types
field.comment: If set to Yes>, customers will be redirected to the external Ingenico ePayments payment page.

field.label: Enable inline payment for these card types
field.tooltip: For the selected card types, the customer can enter the credit card details directly in the checkout.
field.comment: When using this feature, make sure to enable all Dynamic Parameters in the Ingenico ePayments Backoffice in section Tech. information > Transaction feedback > Alias gateway and Tokenization.

field.label: Enable 3D secure
field.tooltip: If the customer's credit card supports 3D Secure, he will be redirected to an external page to enter his password.

field.label: Enable for backend
field.tooltip: This sets if this payment method should also be available for orders from the Magento backend.
